page.title: 01THE AREA
page.content: This D block contains four villages: {Selston, Jacksdale, Westwood and {Bagthorpe.}The major industry in the area is{coal mining.}There are 3 mines still operating in the immediate area although only one is located in the block. Other industries include {textiles and plastics. Ouite a large proportion of the area is covered by farmland.{Cereal crops predominate but there are{dairy farms and some{poultry farming. The area has changed quite a lot over the years. The canal, parts of the railway, the pipe works and iron works have all been closed not only causing loss of jobs but also derelict sites and subsequent 'eyesores'. The area lacks major roads but is criss-crossed by minor roads joining the villages. However,the{M1 motorway does facilitate travel north and south
